meanings.definition: A student or recent graduate working as an apprentice in a particular profession.
meanings.sent1: The interns at the hospital are learning from experienced doctors.
meanings.sent2: Many interns apply for internships to gain practical experience.
meanings.sent3: The interns accidentally mixed up the patient files, creating a humorous situation.
meanings.sent4: The interns are like eager young saplings, growing under the guidance of seasoned professionals.
meanings.sent5: The image of interns diligently taking notes in the classroom is etched in my memory.

meanings.sent1: She interns at a law firm to learn more about the legal field.
meanings.sent2: He interns during the summer to explore different career paths.
meanings.sent3: The cat interns at the mouse hole, hoping to catch a glimpse of its prey.
meanings.sent4: Time interns with no regard for our wishes, moving steadily forward.
meanings.sent5: The sun interns in the sky, casting its warm rays on the earth below.
